title: Cape Lookout National Seashore: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps      Â    The following maps are currently available in pdf format. You will need the free Adobe Acrobat Reader program to view these maps.    Park Map  The Road to Cape Lookout    The Cape Lookout National Seashore official park map (pdf - 1 mb) shows the locations of key points of interest, visitor centers, and ferry landings.   Many roads lead to Cape Lookout National Seashore, check out the area map (pdf - 97 kb) showing the main access routes to the park.       Driving Map: South Core Banks  Driving Map: North Core Banks    Use this South Core Banks driving map (pdf, 239 kb) to find exit ramps off the back "road" for the Great Island Cabin Camp, Cape Lookout Light Station, and other areas.    Use this North Core Banks driving map (pdf, 197 kb) to find exit ramps off the back "road" for the Long Point Cabin Camp, Portsmouth Village, and other areas.        Great Island Cabin Camp Map  Long Point Cabin Camp Map    This map of the Great Island Cabin Camp (pdf,  15 kb) shows the location of the office, volunteer caretaker's cabin, bathhouse, and each of the 25 rental cabins.   This map of the Long Point Cabin Camp (pdf, 24 kb) shows the location of the office, volunteer caretaker's cabin, bathhouse, and each of the 20 rental cabins.       Personal Watercraft (PWC) Landing Map      There are 10 areas on the soundside where PWCs may land. Be sure to check the access map (pdf - 530 kb) before riding out to the banks.
